JASEL CHAUHAN
Full Stack Web Developer || Financial Analyst || Friendly Dude
About

I'm a Full Stack Web Developer and Financial Analyst who is on the lookout for fresh new opportunities.

Excited by the possibilities of code I am seeking an environment where I can be constantly challenged and stimulated, continuing my growth as a developer.

Currently London based.

Portfolio

find-a-fest

AngularJS single page app which harnesses multiple APIs in conjunction with each other to suggest festivals for user.

zenspace

A group coded project which allowed users to find 'zen' spots in London based on their location.

sparewall

connects people with spare walls with artists who want to paint them!

leap theremin

a musical instrument developed with a leap motion controller

litesweeper

JavaScript based logic puzzle game!

Experience

Financial Analyst, Microsoft

I was the lead OPEX analyst in central finance UK headquarters and maintained key financial rhythms and business partnering of a $20m OPEX fund. During my 4 and a half years I developed numerous data cubes and financial reports using Excel, Access, PowerPivot, DAX and MDX.

WDI, General Assembly

Attended the Web Development Immersive course which enabled me to gain a strong foundational understanding in Full Stack Web Development as well as developing industry standard practices such as AGILE workflow, TDD and Git version control. Developed primarily in JavaScript, using NodeJS, Express, Angular and MongoDB.

Freelance Developer & Teacher

Developing websites and applications. Teaching code on an individual basis. Additionally have learnt new technologies including Leap Motion, Raspberry Pi and Arduino development

Contact

Jasel Chauhan © 2016.
made with positive vibrations

find-a-fest

Developed a single page Angular app which finds a festival dependent on user input. API mashup using Google Maps, Eventbrite and Weather APIs. Full MEAN stack app with oAuth Facebook and Eventbrite login.

  • Curious? Click here to see more of this project
  • Date: April 2016

zenspace

Group project which allowed users to find 'zen' spots in London based on their location. Uses Google Places API, developed using NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, BCrypt, JWTs.

  • Curious? Click here to see more of this project
  • Date: March 2016

sparewall

sparewall is a website which connects people who own spare walls with those who want to paint them. It was made for my second project at GA WDI and was built in 5 days using Ruby, Sinatra, MVC design pattern with full RESTful routes, Google Maps API, BCrypt, Bower Components and a dash of Hipster Ipsum! To view the code click here

  • Curious? Click here to see more of this project
  • Date: March 2016

leap theremin

Developed using a leap motion controller, html5 canvas for the visualiser and html5 audio for the sound processing and analysing.

  • Curious? Click here to see more of this project
  • Date: Oct 2016

litesweeper

A JavaScript based logic puzzle game! Litesweeper has been coded using both jQuery and vanilla JavaScript, with CSS3 for styling and HTML 5 for DOM structure. To view the code click here

  • Date: February 2016
